(26) #Dng-Y rén dng zhng, Rìbn rén jiù zhng-zhe hi tóufa.

(57) Wenigstens konnten bei diesem Zugunglück [EInige]F Leute
at least could in this trainwreck some people
'At least in that trainwreck SOME people could be saved.'

(58) ##Wenigstens wurden bei diesem großen Zugunglück viele Leute getötet.
at least were in this big trainwreck many people killed
'##At least in that big trainwreck several people were killed.'

(60) Es wurden nicht alle Leute getötet,aber immerhin starb der Zugführer.
were not all people killed but IMMERHIN died the conductor
'Not all people were killed, but at least the conductor died.'

(62) Es sind nicht alle gestorben ­ wenigstens/zumindest glaube ich das.
it are not all died at least believe I that
'Not all people have died ­ at least I think so.'
